Uses of ServiceInstance in org.cloudifysource.domain.context
 

Methods in org.cloudifysource.domain.context that return ServiceInstance
 ServiceInstance[] Service.getInstances()
          Returns the instances of this service.
 ServiceInstance[] Service.waitForInstances(int howmany, long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
          Waits for the specified number of instances to become available, where A service instance is considered available once its compute node has started, recipe has been loaded and the 'init' phase has executed.
